title: component
name: component
description: Creates and defines a component object; encloses functionality that you build in CFML and enclose within cffunction tags. This tag contains one or more cffunction tags that define methods. Code within the body of this tag, other than cffunction tags, is executed when the component is instantiated.

attributes.name: synchronized
attributes.description: If set to true all calls to an instance of a component are synchronized. This setting allows a method to be executed only by one single thread at a time.

attributes.name: persistent
attributes.description: Specifies CFC is persistent or not

attributes.name: extends
attributes.description: Name of parent component from which to inherit methods and properties.

attributes.name: displayname
attributes.description:
A string to be displayed when using introspection to show
            information about the CFC. The information appears on the
            heading, following the component name.
            If the style attribute is set to document, the displayname
            attribute is used as the name of the service element in the WSDL.

attributes.name: hint
attributes.description: Text that displays when you use introspection to show information about the CFC. The hint attribute value appears below the component name heading. Use this attribute to describe the purpose of the component.

attributes.name: output
attributes.description:
- true: permits component method output
				- false: suppresses component method output

attributes.name: style
attributes.description: Specifies whether a CFC used for web services uses RPC-encoded style or document-literal style

attributes.name: namespace
attributes.description:
Specifies the namespace used in the WSDL when
            using the CFC as a document-literal style web service.
            If you don't specify this attribute, Lucee
            derives the namespace from the CFC class name.
            This attribute applies only when style="document".

attributes.name: serviceportname
attributes.description:
Specifies the name of the port element in the WSDL.
            This attribute applies only when style="document".

attributes.name: serviceaddress
attributes.description:
Specifies the SOAP URL of the web service. If you don't specify this attribute, Lucee uses the URL of the CFC in the WSDL service description.
			Use this attribute to specify the protocol, for example, by specifying a URL that starts with https://. This attribute applies only for web services.

attributes.name: porttypename
attributes.description:
Specifies the name of the porttype element in the WSDL.
            This attribute applies only when style="document".

attributes.name: bindingname
attributes.description:
Specifies the name of the binding element in the WSDL.
            This attribute applies only when style="document".

attributes.name: wsdlfile
attributes.description:
A properly formatted WSDL file to be used instead of
            WSDL generated by Lucee.
            This attribute applies only when style="document".
